description:
A wolf encounters the most terrifying thing in the world.  A tengu plays tricks with potatoes. Kanne and his merry band race a princess.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furuya no Mori / Tengu to Jagaimo / Kanne to Ohime-sama no Kakegoro
The Forest of Furuya / The Tengu and the Potato / The Kakegoro of Kanne and the Princess
ふるやのもり / 天狗とじゃがいも / 勘右衛門[かんね]とお姫様のかけごろ
